DOC.detailed_description: This study enroll HBV mono-infected pregnant woman cohort manage outpatient clinics/delivery unit YouAn Hospital Beijing . Subjects prospectively follow gestation week 26 postpartum week 52 . Treatment na√Øve mother HBV DNA > 6 log10 c/mL normal ALT eligible . Mothers abnormal fetus , cirrhosis evidence hepatocellular carcinoma ( HCC ) exclude . At gestation week 28 , mother receive telbivudine ( LdT ) 600 mg per day lamivudine ( Lam ) 100 mg per day postpartum 4 treatment per preference . All infant receive standard immunoprophylaxis . Data collect patient record use data extraction form . Primary endpoint vertical transmission rate infant ' age 52 week safety telbivudine lamivudine use .
